text: Ghabrivirales is an order of double-stranded RNA viruses. It is the only order in the class Chrysmotiviricetes. The name of the order derives from Said Ghabrial, a pioneering researcher who studied viruses in this order, and -virales which is the suffix for a virus order. The name of the class is a portmanteau of member viruses (chrysovirus, megabirnavirus, and totivirus), and -viricetes which is the suffix for a virus class. ==Taxonomy== totiviruses The following families are recognized: *Chrysoviridae *Megabirnaviridae *Quadriviridae *Totiviridae ==References== Category:Viruses
title: Ghabrivirales
